Text: as requested.. took me a while to get this so please enjoy and seed for as long as you can this one is rare =)
Hi mate I think u need to re-encode the video file so the subs are hardcoded into the movie! As far as I can see psp doesnt support SRT files.

I do that cuz alot of people watches these movies on their pc with vlc player or media player classic. People with iphones can use SrtiPhone to convert the srt file to txt that can be displayed on their iphone =) Personally I never use subtitles... sorry for not being more helpful.
thanks for mentioning srtiphone, i had never heard of it before but its much easier than re-encoding every movie i download

@on.off.on

thank you very much mate. u own me :)
